Text: Retail Energy Foresight FREE Trial IssueDear Colleague Need information on retail energy markets Retail Energy Foresight a bimonthly publication with switch rate predictions and thoughtful analysis is what you need to understand todays volatile retail energy markets Download FREE trial issues from XENERGYs web site at XENHOMEnsfHTMLDocsBForesight Every issue of Retail Energy Foresight presents Switch rates by utility service territory and customer class from around the nation Predictions of switch rates for Pennsylvania Illinois and other markets An intimate look at markets and related topics this month read about Market Backwaters and potential for revival All of the above served up with our own brand of humor to make retail energy markets actually fun to read about Take a look at what Retail Energy Foresight has to offer We think youll agree its a valuable and unique analysis publication and hope that youre tempted to subscribe To do so print out and fax back the order form on the last page of any issue from our Web site or call me at x Regards Susan Weber Editor Retail Energy Foresight Tel x Fax About Us Retail Energy Foresight is published by XENERGY an energy consulting firm with years experience specializes in understanding the retail energy markets With the help of our clients we have invested over million studying retail energy markets making us uniquely qualified to provide the analysis and predictions you need to thrive in this new arena If you would like to have your email address removed from this mailing list please reply with remove name in the subject field
